website_summaries.verdict: A quality set of colorful and affordable classroom stools.
pros: Multicolored stools are sturdy and stackable
Made from metal and plastic, designed to hold up to 265 pounds
Pack of 5 sits at a quality price point
Holes in seats provide proper air ventilation

customer_reviews.title: Nice stools that fit my need.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these stools to work with my Arcade1Up games and they have worked perfectly. They have been used by small kids all the way up to 300 lb adults and are sturdy and comfortable. The bright colors look great with the games and they were a big hit at my recent company potluck (see photo). The stools received steady use for about 3 hours by about 150 adults and performed without issue. I had a bit of trouble getting the plastic off of the legs because the plastic surrounds the screws but found that if I scored the plastic at the screw location it was much easier to remove. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I had the package for few months and just opened it. The stools are brightly colored. They came assembled. That was great! The stools seem to be sturdy, the right height for a 2nd-5th grade study table, and comfortable for short periods of time. For the small space I have, the stools are a perfect fit. I wanted them in all red and at least 6 in the package. I want to see if they hold up after a few months of use. I’m pleased. This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: An awesome1

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Homeschooling 6 kids makes a need for seating. I ordered these for our table so they could all sit and do their school work. I was not sure it would be worth the money so I only bought one set but I am impressed and will be ordering another set or two for our homeschool. It would be easy for them to move them around because they are so light but I would like for them to have seats where they need them. I would recommend these to homeschooling families and teachers because of the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great for children.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these, I meant them to be for adults to use when we had a lot of people over. While they are not really for adult use, they are great for kids. I was going to send them back but decided to keep them for family get-togethers. They are very sturdy and because they stack, they are super convenient. The kids like them because they are colorful. I kept them because they are good quality and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Granados

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the plastic covering! Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are really nice! They’re very sturdy and the seats are even a bit wider than the similar ones my school bought. I would give them five stars except for the infuriating laziness in the factory! The plastic covering the chairs for shipping is placed on first, THEN they screw the pegs into the seats. It’s extremely frustrating and almost impossible to remove all of the plastic. There’s literally no good reason to do this. It took me forever to pull off all of the plastic and there’s still a bunch stuck in the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my classroom library, and was shocked to find how sturdy these are! :) They are plastic, but I do not see the students breaking them anytime soon and kids are rough on things. lol They also can hold the weight of an average adult, which is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools in my classroom! My second graders love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love them and the fact they stack is another plus due to having not a lot of space in my family childcare. They are well made and will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: corinna

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The seats came fully assembled, which was great! The colors are beautiful and brighten up my classroom. The students love them and it saves space because we can easily push them underneath are small group Kidney Table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I thought one of these would be great, but they only sold them in 4-packs. So I went with it. One goes in (and out) of our small shower bath...so I can scrub feet or whatever, sitting down. Another is at the back door to our small patio, so going in and out there is a place to put down one of the things in my two hands--to shut the door. The 3rd and 4th are stacked with books for the Little Library I'm the de facto Little Librarian of in front of our home. So actually I did need all 4.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Drimmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small, light weight kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: I got these last year for my classroom and I only have 2 left this year. The kids will inevitably rock on them no matter how many times you tell them not to, and the legs just snap off from the tops. I teach 4th graders, I think they would be great for younger grades. If you teach older grades, invest in something more sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: TNels

customer_reviews.title: perfect classroom addition
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what I needed in the classroom. Great quality and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Mom in CT

customer_reviews.title: Two problems
customer_reviews.text: I would have happily given five stars to these lightweight compact stools, but there are two problems. 1) the wrapping makes not sense. You literally have to disassemble each still if you want to remove all the plastic cover, because it’s screwed into the stool itself. So if you don’t have a screwdriver you will be annoyed. 2) several of the stools have screws that were over-screwed, causing the plastic ring underneath to crack. This means you can’t really tell how far to screw in, and thus can cause some unevenness
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat these for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and colorful. Bought these to go in the storm cellar because they will stack. Worked perfectly! They came early and packed very well. In fact, there was so much plastic on them that it was annoying to take it off. Better than expected and sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Nofire

customer_reviews.title: Great little stools
customer_reviews.text: I use the stools in my classroom. I got one set of five multi-color to start the year. I just decided that I would like more. We have been using the first set since September and they have been great so far. They are lightweight and easy to move around and stack. They work great to gather a group around our kidney-shaped table. I'm not sure how well they will hold up over time, but no issues so far. I loved that they come fully assembled. I don't think these would be comfortable to sit on all day, but we do not use them as our only seats.
customer_reviews.author: Katie 12345

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and sturdy enough for 6’2” muscle men!
customer_reviews.text: These stack or slip under my kitchen table -ready for guests!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla N

customer_reviews.title: Nice stools
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be used as plant stands because they're small enough to hold the weight of the plant without tipping over and I didn't want to buy expensive furnishings designated as plant stands. I also use the stools to sit on as I'm planting the plants in the pots. The colors are beautiful and bright and they have a nice, shiny finish. A good purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. I bought them for my fourth grade classroom. They are sturdy and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ricksta

customer_reviews.title: Great for my classroom.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for ny 3rd grade class room. They are brightly colored, nice and sturdy too. I can't wait for my students to start using them.
customer_reviews.author: Julienicky

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for chairs for my childrens craft table but many were expensive for 4+. These are higher than the typical children chairs but are very well made and I can tell they will last long. The color is very vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Bought one set, then added a second set!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Stools stack well, are sturdy enough for kids and are a great classroom addition. Bought one set to try out and came back for a second set! Removing the plastic wrap is a little tedious, but great value and product.
customer_reviews.author: v75rab

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: My students love the colors of these stools and I like that they're inexpensive and sturdy. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Classroom seating
customer_reviews.text: Good for alternate seating as long as the kids leave the legs on the floor. If they lean back, of course, the kids goes flying with the chair. Another classroom lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: DGR

customer_reviews.title: The way this thing is packaged in plastic drove me nuts!
customer_reviews.text: super light as expected, but again, the way it is warpped with plastic is epic.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Work great for 6th graders!
customer_reviews.text: Use these with my 6th grade class and we all feel comfortable on them, including myself (teacher). They are super lightweight and easy to stack and hide under a table too!
customer_reviews.author: Darragh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stools! I bought them for school. I can’t wait to use them this school year. Trust they will get used A LOT!
customer_reviews.author: ksweeney59

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chairs quite a while ago. So far they are sturdy. I like them light weighted and with nice color. But the plastic wraps are so hard to tear off.
customer_reviews.author: Yen

customer_reviews.title: Great as plant stands for container plants!
customer_reviews.text: These stools were perfect for lining my driveway with flowering container plants. They add color and keep the pots high enough to weed whack. I’ve gotten many compliments on their artsy design.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Vanderpool

customer_reviews.title: Too much plastic wrap !
customer_reviews.text: I promise you will regret after you buy it! You will spend all day to take off the plastic wrap what cover the chairs 100% everywhere . And in the end you still can not clear up it all ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Li

customer_reviews.title: Great for classrooms
customer_reviews.text: If these things can stand up to my 4-5 grade boys Sunday school class they can stand up to anything. Over all satisfied with them. The kids really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Look great! They are great for the classroom and they are awesome! They came packaged very nicely and are bot broken!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brown

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be of good quality. We have 6 kids and are always needing an extra seat here and there around the house and during our school days at home. These are comfortable for the kids and adults too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are so colorful; the Kinder teacher loved this gift and her students enjoy the alternative seating!
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for classroom use
customer_reviews.text: These are working out great for my first grade class. Very sturdy and vibrant colors. Would highly recommended for elementary classrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie E

customer_reviews.title: Useful for a Classroom
customer_reviews.text: It is being used in my niece’s second grade classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Stools
customer_reviews.text: Update: These are fun stools. I use them in my classroom with 6 and 7 year olds. But now, I have one stool that wobbles that didn’t start that way. May be just a defect... I wish you could also buy these as one instead of a set.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised! A couple of the stools had small scratches in the paint, but they can be touched up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzi

customer_reviews.title: Great company!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs and this company!! They worked with me in returning an item that was sent by mistake. BUT... I didn’t catch it before a month had gone by. They didn’t really have to help but they sent me a return label and sent out the correct items within a week!! So happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Empey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!!! I love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking loveeeee them!!!! The colors are amazing, they're easy to clean and carry around anywhere. Could be used for inside or out.... Worth the buyyyy, I LOOOVEEEE THEM!!!!! I'm going to order a black set too!!! Perfecttt!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kennia Caldentey

customer_reviews.title: Great stools for the classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools and so do the kids! The class sizes are getting larger each year so space is at a premium. These stools work great for student desks, meeting tables and can be easily stacked. I'd like to replace all the chairs in my room with these! I ready to order more.
customer_reviews.author: John Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great stools for classroom
customer_reviews.text: Great stools for my 3rd grade classroom. Kids love them and don’t ever rock/tip in them. Nice and sturdy. We generally keep them unstacked, but it’s nice to stack as well. So far no paint chips/scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hubner

customer_reviews.title: My Sunday School students enjoy these chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Sunday School classroom. They work great for 3rd thru 5th graders. They are sturdy, portable, stack nicely for storage and housekeeping, and the kids love the fun colors. This was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: SHERYL DERMODY

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: These are so versatile- I have one at my sons desk, one by my other son's bed to hold his lamp..I love the colors, and they held up pretty well so far ( by boys are rough on everything) but its only been about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Newman

customer_reviews.title: Kindergarten approved!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kindergarten classroom! The kids enjoy the stools, and they are quite sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wesselhoft

customer_reviews.title: Delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product, one of the stools was cracked on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super asset for my classroom.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect seating for my small group area with my kidney table and the colors are super cute. Excellent stools for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mtc

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a teacher and ordered these stools for my small group table. I love them and they fit perfectly. They are sturdy but light weight. The colors are on point!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors, sturdy, & great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love the vibrant colors, it works well at my table for small group. Even though the plastic took a little longer to get off, I appreciate the chairs being assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Stools for the Classroom
customer_reviews.text: I use these stools for flexible seating around my 3rd grade classroom. They appear to be holding up well to frequent use by the kids. The colors are bright and cheerful.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Masuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it came in packs of six(most school tables are in multiples of two, four or six, not five. I am very happy with the constructions and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. Grady

customer_reviews.title: Extra seating for students
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for classroom centers. No need to move chairs around for extra seating. Keeps classroom neat, colorful, and noise free.
customer_reviews.author: EpicArt820

customer_reviews.title: Nice colorful stools!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! Using them in my classroom. They came very organized and just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Colors are vibrant. Let’s hope they last a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: JMuM

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got these chairs for my classroom. Adds a nice pop of color while making the room less cramped. Very lightweight yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. And the kids in the classroom love them.
customer_reviews.author: Ximena Gomez-Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Great for flex seating
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for flex seating. Easy for kids to move. Durable enough to withstand daily use by young children.
customer_reviews.author: MommaC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my classroom
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors and how sturdy these chairs are.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn N

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! My only complaint is that the plastic wrap paper is hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Classroom
customer_reviews.text: Used in my classroom. Light weight, stackable. Hold up to abuse pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Stinger Barnes

customer_reviews.title: ... classroom and giving the kids extra seating is a perfect option!
customer_reviews.text: These seats work wonders in the classroom and giving the kids extra seating is a perfect option!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
